version_description:
This is the time for a new update of Bid Wars: Pawn Empire! Check it out:
Improvements to the game map;
A new building where you can send rare items to be identified as replicas or the real deal;
Mutt and Sergeant Cobbler are back on new quests, and expect trouble as your success draws the attention of pawn mogul Richard Sellers;
The groundwork for an upcoming update where you will discover the story behind each of the rare items you come across!

Time to show who is the greatest bidder with this new update!
* Use energy to travel throughout the world for the best auctions;
* Use the calculator power up to find out how much an unit is worth;
* And kick adversaries out of an unit with the Boot power up!

Ready to build your pawn empire all over the globe? Because this update brings you fun for everyone!
- Game fully localized in Spanish, Italian, French, German, Japanese and Tradicional Chinese;
- Improvements to the English and Portuguese versions of the game;
- Minor bug fixes to improve your experience!

Hello Bidders! Are you excited for this next update? We've been working really hard to increase your experience even further!
- We've added a brand new building! You can now access Mutt's house and negotiate in his totally legal market!
- We've made significant improvements in the games performance. No more freezes and stuff!
- We've reduced the time required to sell some items and we've made some alterations in quests in order to grant a smooth experience. We don't want anybody stuck!
Hey y'all bidders! We're releasing this version to fix some issues we found in the game so that you all can have the best experience with us!

Hello, bidders! You asked for it, and we deliver! Get ready for the largest Pawn Empire update to date!
- 300 new items, including several new rare items!
- Highly improved quest experience, to help you know what you need to do next!
- Updated dialogue system with an introduction to the characters you love and hate!
- We added Side Quests! Now you can help your favorite characters with tasks along the city!
- We added loads of new quests and objectives!

"Yo Bidders, in this version you will be able to:
- Know where to find those items you've been craving to put your hands on
- Enjoy a bit of the game's story throughout our brand new initial cut scene"

"Yo Bidders, in this version you will be able to:
- Know where to find those items you've been craving to put your hands on
- Enjoy a bit of the game's story throughout our brand new initial cut scene"

Hey y'all, bidders!

- Do you speak Hindi? This cool language is now available in your favorite bid game.
- For the last second bidders out there: clearer, bigger and flashy feedback!
- Are you in the quest for certain items? It's simpler to take quest items to your item store!
- Check out the new Haul screens! Now it's easier to choose the items you want to take from the auctions.
- Don't have enough Bid Bucks? You can see exactly how much you need to make that killer bid.

Thanks for playing

What's up, bidders!

We've prepared a new update with general bug fixes and optimizations to help you in your empire building efforts. Go bid!

Yo, bidders! New update live in da house!

We've tuned your favorite game with general optimizations and whacked bugs so you can focus on the good stuff: pimpin' up that Pawn Shop!

There's new stuff in Bid Wars Pawn Empire!

* New offers you just can't miss!
* New packs on the store!
* Get gold for free every day!
* More bugs and nuisances resolved!
* And we are still working on improving our interface and performance for your enjoyment!

Let's play!

Thank you for playing Bid Wars Pawn Empire! Please do not forget to leave a new review! Your feedback means a lot!

There's new stuff in Bid Wars Pawn Empire!

* New offers you just can't miss!
* New packs on the store!
* Get gold for free every day!
* More bugs and nuisances resolved!
* And we are still working on improving our interface and performance for your enjoyment!

Let's play!

Thank you for playing Bid Wars Pawn Empire! Please do not forget to leave a new review! Your feedback means a lot!

Lots of new stuff:
A New VIP offer! UNLEASH YOUR TRUE POTENTIAL in Bid Wars: Pawn Empire!
New offers you just can't miss!
More bugs and nuisances resolved!
And we are still working on improving our interface and performance for your enjoyment!
Let's play!
Thank you for playing Bid Wars: Pawn Empire! Please do not forget to leave a new review! Your feedback means a lot!

We have an incredible news for you... THE AMAZING UPDATE of Special Auctions is AVAILABLE!
Have you always dreamed of finding a LEGENDARY Car in an auction? Now is your chance at AUTOMOBILE auctions!
Wanna find out what the government is hiding from us? Play the AREA 51 auction!
New Items to Find and Collect!
New Missions to show how good you are!
And many more ways to profit!
Thank you for playing Bid Wars: Pawn Empire! Please do not forget to leave a new review! Your feedback means a lot!

What's new in BidWars: Pawn Empire

THE NEWEST UPDATE for Special Auctions is AVAILABLE and even BETTER!

Now besides being able to play the new SPECIAL Auctions for AUTOMOBILES and AREA 51 we also have ... Auctions for FAMOUS People !!!!

New Special Auction Missions to complete and progress.

New Special Auction Items added to collect.

And even more ways to PROFIT!

Thank you for your preference! Don't forget to leave a new review, your feedback is precious!

There's new stuff in BidWars: Pawn Empire!

More bugs and nuisances resolved!

SPORTS, ARMY and BOATS are the New SPECIAL AUCTIONS that are AVAILABLE NOW

A New Chapter in the story and New Missions

New Cars, Celebrities and Area 51 items in their respective Special Auctions

"Lucky Spin" at the end of the Auctions !! With that you will get out of the red or Profit EVEN MORE

We fixed some bugs too :)

Another new way to Win and Profit is available to players at our Casino. A Slot Machine has been added for you to test your luck and feel like you are in Las Vegas, with it, you can even choose how much you want to bet, and the bigger your bet the better your prizes will be !!!

Now you can become a VIP for different periods of time with the new offers in the store, making it even easier and lasting to be the auction Big Boss

We also repositioned the icons on the map screen for a better experience and ease of use.

Along with this, more bugs and nuisances were solved!
